projects.name: Guava Fruit Disease Dataset @ IoThink Lab
projects.summary: Collaborated on dataset collection for interdisciplinary research.

projects.name: MRI Image Denoising using Wavelet Transform
projects.summary: Applying wavelet transform techniques to reduce noise in MRI images and comparing results using metrics such as MSE, PSNR, and SSIM.
highlights: Explored various wavelet functions (db3, bior6.8, sym4), decomposition leveds, optimal threshold value estimation (universal/bayes), thresholding methods (hard/soft) to find the best combination that can mitigate gaussian noise from image

projects.name: Quantum Variational Classifier @ Womanium Program
projects.summary: Implemented a quantum classifier for Penguin Species Classification.

projects.name: Quanvolutional Neural Networks @ Womanium Program
projects.summary: Developed a hybrid quantum convolutional model for MNIST Digit Classification.

projects.name: Quantum Regression Model @ Womanium Program
projects.summary: Implemented a Quantum Machine Learning Model to learn and predict the sine function on the interval [0, 2Ï€].

projects.name: QML for Conspicuity Detection in Production
projects.summary: Final project for the Womanium Quantum + AI 2024 program that earned me the QSL fellowship nomination. I implemented a Hybrid Quantum Convolutional Neural Network to detect anomalies in production.
highlights: Implemented a 3x3 kernel using Quantum Circuit along with a classical CNN.
Implemented various layers as ansatz(e) for a Quantum Regression Model and performed comparison.
